skill.name: Pet Bond
skill.description: Strengthen your bond with your pet and unlock helpful farm-side perks.
skill.level1: 5% chance of a Comforted luck buff in the morning if the pet slept nearby.
skill.level2: Pet moves a bit faster; tiny chance to bark/meow when crows appear (flavor).
skill.level3: Lingering near the pet grants Emotional Support (+Defense/Energy) for the evening.
skill.level4: Mild protection aura reducing incoming damage.
skill.level5: Choose: Trail Scout (foraging helper) or Home Guardian (defense).
skill.level6: Pet may bring small items in the morning when well cared for.
skill.level7: Pet buffs last longer; small friendship bonus when chatting near your pet.
skill.level8: Rainy days with a filled bowl grant Cozy Morning (+Farming +Luck).
skill.level9: Pet interaction can clear one negative debuff once per day.
skill.level10: Choose a mastery perk based on your profession branch.
profession.trailscout.name: Trail Scout
profession.trailscout.desc: Pet forages near the house and boosts your Foraging when petted outdoors.
profession.homeguardian.name: Home Guardian
profession.homeguardian.desc: Pet guards the farm, adding Defense and cleaning a bit of debris.
profession.pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
profession.pathfinder.desc: Better daily foraging with minerals; see marked finds on the map.
profession.treasuresniffer.name: Treasure Sniffer
profession.treasuresniffer.desc: Lower forage chance but rare loot; pre-mine petting adds Luck & Mining.
profession.wardenscompanion.name: Warden's Companion
profession.wardenscompanion.desc: Extra Defense and reduced early-floor dungeon damage; rare nightly gifts.
profession.farmsentinel.name: Farm Sentinel
profession.farmsentinel.desc: Improved nightly cleanup, crow denial, and slight storm crop protection.
